title: parama pitA
sahitya:
parama pitA pUraNam taruvAn bhakti paravasharAi vArungaL


anupallavi

  karuNai purindu nammaik-kAkkum kaDavuLaik-karuttuDan vaNangiDa sErungaL


caraNam    sEyuLam koNDavar tUya uLLattil shen shuDar pOloLir jyOti
tAyinum anbuDan sAdhu janangaLait-tAngu shuddhAnanda jyOti Om
